name: Midnight Shift (itch)
description:
Update! — Midnight Shift Remake is in the works. It will feature a complete graphical overhaul and a brand new horror experience separate from the base project.

Synopsis

Midnight Shift puts players in the role as an ordinary security guard for a mannequin storage facility. At the end of a seemingly ordinary shift, strange things begin to happen in the facility. Leaving won't be easy as the keys required for the exit doors have been misplaced.

Development

This was my first Unity project I created during my time at Edmonton Digital Arts College. The project was created in eight weeks with little prior coding experience. This short horror experience can be considered a prequel to the more recent (and superior) project, Urbex.

View my other works: md-pd.weebly.com
